subject: Re: Eclipse debugger only stops in static method breakpoints with JUnit4 runner
msgSnippet: ... I believe Helios release is Eclipse 3.6 ... Using the standard Run As JUnit Test , nothing EE_specific. The JUnit tests send http requests to a couple of
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> Breakpoints in @Test methods work for me, so it's not universally
> broken. I don't use EE, so that might be one data point. What
> version of Eclipse are you on?

I believe Helios release is Eclipse 3.6

>
> My guess is that this has something to do with classloading. Are you
> using the standard "Run As JUnit Test" shortcuts, or something
> EE-specific?

Using the standard "Run As JUnit Test", nothing EE_specific.

The JUnit tests send http requests to a couple of services that were also launched in Eclipse.

Leo

>
> David
>
